Mars.Discovered: Known to the ancients and visible to the naked eye.
Mars.Atmosphere Comp: 95% Carbon Dioxide, 3% Nitrogen, 1.5% Argon, 0.5% Other Gases
Mars.Visited: 2001 Mars, Odyssey, Mars Express, MER-A 'Spirit', MER-B 'Opportunity', Mars Reconnaissance Oribter, Rosetta, Phoenix, Dawn, MSL Curiousity, Mars Orbiter Mission, MAVEN, ExoMars Trace Gas Orbiter
Mars.Day: Slightly more than 1 Earth Day (24 hours, 37 minutes)
